articles.content: A fintech start-up which paid more than 3,000 influencers including Premier League footballers and Love Island stars to promote a debit card it claimed would be 'one of the world's most secure' has b… [+5273 chars]

articles.author: Alexandra Topping
articles.title: Women in mid-30s may never know equal pay in their working lives - The Guardian
articles.description: More than 40% of working women worried about impact of Covid on job prospects
articles.content:
Women in their mid-30s will never know equal pay in their working lives if progress towards tackling the gender gap is not accelerated, according to new analysis.
